attributes.action: Allow horses to be rided at Manchester or anywhere in UK, like in blackpool.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about restrictions on when horses can use local roads are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are concerned about restrictions on horses using the roads in your area you could raise this with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
